document_data.caption: The [[Anstruth harp]], named after the original college.
document_data.name: College of Anstruth
document_data.mainbody: The '''College of Anstruth''' ({{Pronounce|ÆN|struth|refs={{Cite dragon/93/Ay pronunseeAYshun gyd|25}}|audio=Anstruth.ogg}}) was a traditional [[bardic college]] in [[Sundabar]].
document_data.Base of Operations: Even centuries after Anstruth's closure, the city of Sundabar remained famous for the quality of its musical instruments.
document_data.Possessions: The ''[[Anstruth harp]]'', one of the ''[[Instruments of the Bards]]'', was named after this college. It had been created by the legendary [[bard]] [[Falataer]] to test and reward his students who achieved mastery of the Anstruth level of skill.
document_data.History:
The College of Anstruth was one of the seven elder bardic colleges, dating back to Falataer, who had established it as the penultimate level of his bardic college. The College of Anstruth ceased its operations sometime after {{Yearlink|1067}}.

As of the {{YearlinkName|1364}}, the only remaining structure from the original college was a concert hall that had been converted into a warehouse.
document_data.Members:
* The [[half-elf]] [[bard]] [[Iriador Wintermist]] studied at Anstruth in the 11{{th}} century [[DR]] but dropped out to join the [[Harpers]] before earning the degree of Magnum Alumnus.
* Sir [[Riordan Parnell]] was a member of the Anstruth College.
